242b7(ca): gnas/ de dbus chos sku rig pa ye shes gdangs// ngo bo stong gas la rang bzhin gdangs la rig/ mtshan nyid dag la spros pa'i mtha' las 'das// rang shar rig pa
243a1(ca): rang grol 'od gsal lo// chos sku rin chen sbubs na rang chas shar// chos nyid spyan ni stong gsal 'gag med la// rin chen rgya mtshor 'brel
243a2(ca): ba d+hu ti tsit+te 'char// dbyer med chos sku'odagasal gdangs kyi sgo mo sgron mar gsal// rang gsal rang grol 'char ba la// dngas snyigs gnyis su snang bas ye shes
243a3(ca): rtsa la ma rdzogs// bag chags sbubs kyi dri mas 'od gsal lung ma thob// gzung 'dzin rtog par gzung bas rang rig mkhyen pa sgribs// chos sku rin chen sbubs na//
243a4(ca): brab zhugs zhes bya'o// lus ngag yid gsum ngo bo'i gdan// dbyer med gcig ste tha dad dag las 'das par gnas// longs skra ye shes gsal ba la// snyigs
243a5(ca): ma 'od lnga zer ni rang gro la rol par gnas// sprul sku thugs rje 'bru gsum snying po 'od// snyigs ma gzung 'dzin zer 'od rang gro la rol par shar// chos sku ye shes
243a6(ca): rig pa'i rang ga dang sa rang rig pa// snyigs ma 'od zer gsal ba phyogs bcur 'phro// 'phro yang chos nyid ma 'das rol pa thim// chos sku'i rol par ye shes
243a7(ca): rang shwa ra// de yi rol pa longs sku ste// longs sku gsung gi yi ge 'bru las// sprul sku thugs rje zer du 'phros// 'phro yang rtsal gyi rol snang ngo bor gcig/
243b1(ca): bden pa dbyer med ngo bo las// ye shes lnga yi rtsal sha ra bas// ma bu gnyis med rang grol lo// sku gsum rang chas rang la gnas pa la// sku gsum ye shes 'char sgo sgo gsum
243b2(ca): zang thal te// de yi lam nas spyan gsum ye shes sgrib med rtogs// dus gsum rang grol dag tu mngon sangs rgyas// seng ge sgra sgrogs nyi zla kha sgor las/ 'gro la sku gsum
243b3(ca): rang chas kyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ de ltar sku gsum rang chas na// da ltar mthong stangs ji ltar
243b4(ca): lags// ma rtogs ngo sprad ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsal pa/ bag chags sha khrag sbubs chud pas// rab rib can gyis bltas pa bzhin// log pa'i snang bar 'khrul pa ste/
243b5(ca): snying po'i don nyid mthong mi 'gyur// dper na rang gi byad nyid kyang // me long dag gis mtshon te bstan// 'khrul pas rang ngo rang mi snang // de bzhin gdams ngag gnyis brten
243b6(ca): na sa// snying po'i don 'di bstan pa las// log rtog blo yis don mi rnyed// dpe yas shes par bya ba'i phyir// ngo sprod bzhi yi brda yang sbyar// e ma ho gsang bdag nges par
243b7(ca): gzung // chos sku rang byung ye shes chen po la// gnyis med ston pa tshig las 'das// mi skye mi 'gag rang bzhin rnam par dag/ yon tan snang tshul brda yis mtshon//
244a1(ca): stong khyab 'gyur med g.yos pa med// dag cing gsal ba gos pa med// phyi nang med pas gzung 'dzin bral// nam mkha' rdo rje rgya mtsho dang // shes
244a2(ca): dang nyi ma pad+ma yis// mtshan nyid dang ni ldan pa ru// rang rig 'khor la brda don sbyar// rtags dang don dang dpes mtshon pa// rtags la mthun dpe dmigs yul ston//
244a3(ca): mtshon tshigs gnas pa'i dbang por bcug/ skal ldan rgyud la rig par gyis// zhes seng ge sgra las/ chos sku ngo sprad pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// /
244a4(ca): / kyebacom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ longs sku ngo spra da gsungs pa ni// thugs rje rang byung nang nas bka' stsal pa// ye shes rtse gcig dgongs pa ste// ye shes lnga/
244a5(ca): yis rang gdangs las// rgyal ba skra lnga 'khor dang bcas// chos nyid glong na 'od gsal ba// ye shes rtse gcig dgongs pa ste// gnyen lcug 'khril ldem rgyan gyis mdzes//
244a6(ca): gsala' tsher lhun sdug 'od zer 'phro// rnam rtog mi mnga' sa le ba// snang la dngos med ye shes lhun gyis grub// gzha' tsho na chu zla me ltar 'dra 'bag bcas// snod ldan rgyud la
244a7(ca): gdams ngag gnyis kyis spras// zhes seng ge sgra las// longs sku ngo sprad pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// // kye tabacom ldan sku lnga 'od snang nang nas/
244b1(ca): bka' stsal pa// bde ga shes sa lnga yi snang ba ni// rang rang so so'i mtshan ma 'od du gsal// gsal la mi gnas ye shes dag pa'i spyan// mtha' dbus med par rang bzhin
244b2(ca): 'od gsal ba// 'gag med sprul sku dus dang gnas skabs sbyar// me mar 'od khyim me long ngos la bstan// brda don rtags su shes par gyis// seng ge sgra las//
244b3(ca): sprul sku ngo sprad pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// // de nas ston pas 'du 'bral med pa ngo sprad pa// rang rig chos sku gsal la rtog pa med// ye
244b4(ca): shes lnga yi mtshan nyid dang ldan la// snying po sku lnga ye shes lhun grub 'char// de yi snang ba ye na sa 'od gsal ba// nyi ma'i snying po 'od dang zer du chas// gdams
244b5(ca): ngag snod ldan ngo yang sma da// spu la sku gnas lugs rtogs byed pa// rdzogs chen 'o da gas la kha sbyor dag la spra // longs sku gnas lugs rtogs byed pa// ma hA 'dra//
244b6(ca): 'bag ngo yang spra // sku gsum dbyer med ngo sprad pa// a nu ngo smra da nyi ma'i snying pos sprad// ces nyi zla kha sbyor la sa/ sku gsum dbyer med ngo sprad pa'i le'u ste so bzhi

245a2(ca): man shel phyi nang med pa bzhin// chos sku phyi nang med pa yin// ma na shel ngo bzang thal bzhin// chos sku ngo bo zang thal yin// ma na she la dri ma med pa bzhin//
245a3(ca): chos sku dri ma med pa yin// man shel rkyen mang nang nas 'od lnga 'char ba ltar// chos sku ye shes lnga 'od khong nas 'char// de nas longs sku dpe bstan pa// me
245a4(ca): long g.ya' dag nang du lugs sku gzhag/ mdun du maN+Dal steng du dmigs rten de gzhag go/ shes rab g.yas pa'i drung du man shel byar// bar snang rig pa'i sgron

245b1(ca): k+Sh+ya kAs m+b+ha ra byung rgyu rkyen med pa yin// N+Di ma 'dra bar rtswa chags 'gro bltar// spyugs parang byung 'od zer dpag med 'gro// nyi ma sgrib mang zang thal dag 'a ltar/
245b2(ca): chos sku sgrib med zong thal dag pa'o// nyi ma'i snying pos 'gro don byed pa ltar// chos sku sku gsum rang byung 'gro don mdzad// chos sku nam mkha' ltar bur rang bzhin

245b4(ca): chu zla bzhin du ngos gzung med// me long gzugs ltar reg pa'i dngos ma grub// sprul pa kham pa'i mi mo khog stong na// sgo lnga bu kar btod nas mar me nang bcug pas/

246a1(ca): gdangs la gsal// rang bzhin 'gag med sna tshogs mtshan nyid stong // spros med me long nang du snang ba dag/ de bzhin rgyang zhag chu yi sgron ma

252a7(ca): bzhin dag pa'i sku gsum rang la rang dbang mtshon nas bskur// shes rab yum lnga bum par mtshon pa ni// nam rma kun tu bzang mo phyag rgya bum paM yis mtshon byang sems chus/
252b1(ca): stong nyid zhe sdang dag byed mtshon te rnam snang dang du grol// chu nyid mA ma ki yi phyag rgya bum pa'i ye shes kyis// nga rgyal dge bar mtshon te rin 'byung dang du grol// me nyid gos
252b2(ca): dkar phyag rgya ye shes bum pa yis// gnyis med rtags mtshon byang chub sems// 'dod chags byams par mtshon te mtha' yas dang du grol// dam tshig sgrol ma phyag
252b3(ca): rgya ye shes bum pa yis// gnyis med rtags mtshon byang chub sems// phrag dog sdom par mtshon nas don grub dang du grol// sangs rgyas spyan ma phyag rgya ye shes bum pa ni// /
252b4(ca): gnyis med dgas mngon pang chub sas sa// krI m+bag 'odags pa mtshan nas rdo rdzas m+b+has pa'i dad la/ zhes seng ge sgra glags thog dman cil byam gnon pa'i da
252b5(ca): pa ye shes zung 'jug/ nyi zla kha sbyor gyi rgyud las// thun mong rdzas la brten pa dbang gile'ud+d+he zhe gcig pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje
252b6(ca): thabs kyi bdag/ bla mas mtshon to ji ltar bskur// bka' stsal pa/ glo bur dri ma dag bya'i phyir// bdud rtsi chu rgyun byang chub sems mtshon nas// bum chu slob bu blugs
252b7(ca): pas ni// sgrib pa mi rtog dag nas mi bskyod ngo bor mtshon// oM badz+ra d+h+ri ka a b+hiShiny+tsa hUM/ dbu rgyan rig pa rin chen dgos 'dod mtshon// slob bu la byin bag chags sgrib pa
253a1(ca): yi sa// longs sku ma rtogs grol nas rin 'byung thob// sA rat+na d+h+ri ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ rdo rje stong nyid ye shes mtshon byas nas// slob bu la gtad
253a2(ca): las kyi sgrib pa dag/ mi rtog ye shes mtha' yas thob// aM a ro lig a b+hi Shiny+tsA a/ sku gsum bzhugs gnas dril bus mtshon// slob bu byin pas skye gnas sgrib pa dag
253a3(ca): thugs rjes sku ma rtog sa pa dag nas don grub tho ba// ha pra dzA d+hi ka a/ bu ma pa s+thi bor gzhag pa sa sku yi dbang thob lus sgri ba dag/ rnam snang ska thob// au tra tsakra a b+hi ShaH
253a4(ca): oM/ slob bu ming gis rang rig rtogs pa mtshon// dz+nyA na tsit+taM bA ka kA ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ming gi dbang byini rang dbang rang la byin// shes bya sgrib dag rdo rje 'chang dbang thob// rig
253a5(ca): pa'i dbang lnga yon tan rang la rdzogs// ma rig lnga 'das ye shes lnga dbang thob// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag lam// ma bskur sku gsum ma rig pa'i dbang zhes bya// rig pa'i
253a6(ca): ye shes lnga la dbang bas rig pa'i dbang // sgrib pa rang grol zad pa rig pa'i dbang // seng ge sgra yi rgyud las/ rig pa'i dbang po sku la mtshon pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// /
253a7(ca): / kyebacom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ 'phrin las gsung gis mtshan pa'i dbang // sku gsum snying po 'bru lnga gdod nas gnas// oM hUM a
253b1(ca): tAM hriye shes lha mtshon slob bur gtad// 'phrin las ma rdzogs dag nas sprul sku thob// thugs nyid skye med rdo rje mtshon// de nyid slob bu snying khar gtad// thugs
253b2(ca): kyi ma rig dag nas ni// rig pa skye 'jig med pa rdo rje thugs dbang thob// oM na ma sa sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Thi a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ rdo rje rtag tu bcang ba rig pa'i mtshan
253b3(ca): nyid mtshon// kha T+wAM tsang ti ka pA las// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya mtsho na// kha T+wAM kha ni shes rab yum// Da ma ru ni yab nyid thabs// shes rab rig pa brda ru mtshon/
253b4(ca): kakAkA la ni gzhal yasaM khang // mtshon te slob bu la gtad nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i me rig dag/ ma rtogs ma rig rig par grol nas mkha' spyad tshe 'dir thob// mi 'jigs
253b5(ca): 'jigs par mi bya ste// khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs las thar// mi bskyod ye shes zhing dag tu// rgyal ba'i sras su skye dbang thob// khyod ni khams gsum dbang sdud de//
253b6(ca): sangs rgyas bdag nyid he ru dpal// khyod la sangs rgyas lung bstan no// he ru ka sarba ta ta thA ga s+t+waM/ khams gsum bdag po dpal ldan rang byung khyod// bdud kyi tshogs rnams
253b7(ca): bcom nas kyang // khyed kyi thugs rje gzhan don mdzod// seng ge sgra las/ lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / bshad pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'phrin las rdzogs nus pas//

254a3(ca): pa dkyil 'khor chu rgyun mtshon// mtshan nyid sku gsum mi 'gyur bas// mi ldog dad pas bdag gis gzung // slob dpon bdag nyid ting 'dzin gyis// sku gsum dkyil

254a6(ca): bdag nyid la// rang nyid rnal 'byor de nyid yin// de phyir rnam pa thams cad du// bdag nyid sku gsum che ba'i mchog/ chos rnams ye shes sgyu ma ste// rten cing 'brel pa'i

255a1(ca): la brten pa dang // nang ltar rdzogs lung rang chas bstan// bsang dbang dam rdzas bdud rtsir mtshon// bdud rtsi lnga nyid spyi bor blangs pas bum pa'i dbang

256b2(ca): byang chub sems nyid rgyun// rang rig lam du mi 'gyur na// 'khrul pas byang chub gang la yin// snang ba 'od snang sku gsum zer// rang gi 'od snang ma yin na// gzhan snang rtag pa lung dang

260a3(ca): zhes seng ge sgra nyi zla kha sbyor las/ le'u ste nga bzhi pa'o// // kye/ bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ sems de rang rgyud ji ltar grol
260a4(ca): bka' skur ba pa/ rang byung ye shes khyab bdal de// sku med sku de ye shes sku// gsung med gsung la 'gag med zer// thugs kyi rig pa 'od gsal rdo rje a// thabs kyi/
260a5(ca): rgyal po 'phrin las yongs la khyab// 'gro ba kun la rig pa'i nyi ma shar// sems de kun gyi rang rgyud la// sangs rgyas ye shes sku gnas pa// sku ni rnam dag 'od kyi sku//
260a6(ca): dngos po'i mtha' las grol bar gnas// sems de 'gro ba'i rang rgyud las// sangs rgyas 'od zer gsung gnas pa// gsung ni 'gag med tshangs pa'i dbyangs// brjod
260a7(ca): pa'i tshig las 'das pa yin// sems de kun gyi rang rgyud la// sangs rgyas thugs kyi rig pa gnas// nyi ma rdo rje 'pho 'gyur med// snying po 'gyur med sku gsung thugs//
260b1(ca): rdo rje lta bu sku snyems pa// bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod bya// sku gcig kun la khyab pa'i sku// nyi ma'i snying po lta bur gnas// man shel lta bur rang dag pas// gzhan snang bye
260b2(ca): braphrag cir snang yang // sku gsum ngo bo 'gyur ba med// ye shes chu bo rgyun bzhin gnas// ye shes lnga snang 'du 'bral med// rdo rje 'dzin pa nges par nyon// sku gsum bde
260b3(ca): ba chen po'i don// 'gro ba yong med kun la khyab// kun gyis rtogs shing mi rig ste// lha la sogs pa'i 'gro drag dang // byang chub sems blo yis 'di mi rig/ theg brgyad blo
260b4(ca): yis rig pa min// lam bgrol btsal bas 'di mi rnyed// sangs rgyas btsal bas grub min pas// de nyid rgyu rkyen 'das pa yin// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rang byung ba//
260b5(ca): de nyid dus gsum rtag par bzhug sa// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ska// dri med rang byung 'od gsal ba// 'gro ba'i rgyud la snang bya ba// ye shes me long dpe don rtags
260b6(ca): kyis mtsho na// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// ye shes chen po la yang bzla// zhes seng ge sgra las/ sems de rang rgyud sku gsum rang gnas lung bstan pa'i le'u
260b7(ca): ste nga lnga pa'o// // kye/ bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ sku gsum 'gro la rang gnas dpe don rtags kyis ji ltar srid// bka'
261a1(ca): stsal pa/ nga ni sems de kun gyi gsos// 'di don nad rnams kun gyi sman// shel ltar ye shes dri med sku bstan dpe// 'gag med rig pa ye
261a2(ca): shes 'od gsal sku// rang la gnas pa mngon sum yul la bstan// ye shes 'od sku chu zla'i tshul// thugs rig 'gag med nyi ma ltar// gdung sgra zer 'od brag cha bzhin/
261a3(ca): ska gsum rtogs pa'i glong du su 'gris pa// rtag chad tshig las 'das pa yin// chos can blo 'das ye shes dri ma med// ma bskyed ye shes dkyil 'khor sgyu ma rnam dag
261a4(ca): glong / klod pa med par chos nyid rang shar ro// de nyid ye nas nam mkha' 'dra// rnam dag nam mkha' mtshon la bstan// de nyid ye nas rdo rje 'dra// skye 'jig med
261a5(ca): pas mtshon la bstan// de nyid ye nas rgya mtsho 'dra// mkha' glong gting mi 'gyur bas mtshon la bstan// de nyid ye nas nyi ma 'dra// gsal 'grib med pas mtshon la bstan// /
261a6(ca): de nyid ye nas ma na shel 'dra// rkyen med 'od lnga nang 'char mtshon la bstan// de nyid ye nas pad+ma 'dra// rnam dag ngo bor mtshon la bstan// gzha' tshon mar me 'dra 'bag
261a7(ca): dang / 'od khang me long ngos mtshon nas// ye shes chen po sku gsum mngon du sprad// ces seng ge sgra nyi zla kha sbyor las/ sku gsum thugs ngo sprad pa'i le'u steng drug
261b1(ca): pa'o// // kyebacom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ sku gsum thugs su ngo sprod pa// gdams ngag gnyis su bstan pa de// thugs rje'i dpe
261b2(ca): rnams ji ltar 'byung // ngag gi chos rnams ji ltar gsungs// bka' stsal pa/ rang byung chos sku nyi ma lta bu las// zer 'od thugs rje 'phros pas pad+ma kha 'bus tshul//
261b3(ca): thog ma'i sangs rgyas nyag gcig las// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku nyid ni// u dum ba ra ri me tog las// snying po'i rang bzhin gzugs skur 'khrungs// shes rab mthar
261b4(ca): phyi ne tha snyad rnam par dag/ rig pa'i khu byug gsung gi sgra yang bsgrags// rang byung ye shes ma 'gags 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas
261b5(ca): gun gyi gtso// thabs mkhas thugs rje stobs nyid mkhyen mnga' bas// 'gro la byams pa gsung gi yi ge drug/ rang byung sgra yi yi ge zhes bya ste// sa sha ha a 'a ma/
261b6(ca): des rmugs rje ma nyam sbyor don drug bstan// sa/ lhun gyis grub pa'i don la sbyor// sha shes rab 'gag se na/ du sbyor// harten med ye shes dbyings la sbyor// ma
261b7(ca): chos rnams mnyam pa'i don du sbyor// a skye med 'od gsal ye shes sbyor// sa spros pa nye bar zhi bar sbyor// yi ge drug gi ye shes gnas bskyal ba/
262a1(ca): chags gnyis su myed pa bsgyug/ samam nyid parang 'dagasal bskul// shAts+tshathabs la mkhas pa sbyirgyud du bsgyul//
262a2(ca): logs gnyis med dbyangs su bstsal/ rig pa yo shes gnyis med 'astsal// 2/ mtha' las 'das pa'i dbyings gru bstsal// gzhi chos po bdas pa ye shes
262a3(ca): thugs rje l-i ga d+hagacas bya// sadabyer med mi shes dang du 'das// a/ byas rtsol med pa'i ngang du 'das// 2tshig dang brda dang blams 'das/
262a4(ca): rmugs rjelde shes chags pa'i sgra// sha shes rab ye shes rtsal byung sgra// hardzogs pa ye shes rang la shar ba'i// / ya~M ge dzAHlas der gyi k+Sha ni//
262a5(ca): rjeg sung gi zhal chems sprul pa lnga// byams pa'i chos ston sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga// 'gro ba'i ston pa gzhag nas bka' ma nyams// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs kyi dpal
262a6(ca): bre'u nas// sangs rgyas mi mnyam mgon po rang byung sku// dbu lo gtsug tor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad nas// sangs rgyas 'jam dpal dri med snying po byung // mdzod sgra
262a7(ca): bde ldan mgon po spyan ras gzigs ci byung // shings nas phyag na rdo rje ljags la byams pa rnam par gzigs// su gsung thugs dang yon tan gyi// rtsa ba'i rgyud lnga
262b1(ca): srung gi zhal chems so// phyag g.yas 'khor lo rin chen zur brgyad las// sangs rgyas gtsug tor dri med rang byung sku// phyag g.yon pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// sangs
262b2(ca): rgyas byams pa kun gzigs byon// zhabs g.yas pa yis ni rgya gram las// sangs rgyas kun grol ye shes rang byung ni// zhabs g.yon ut+pal nam mkha'i snying po byung /
262b3(ca): de rnams rtogs pa'i ye shes chos la dbang sgyur ba// snyan rgyud bzhi ba shad zer du 'phros pas sangs rgyas stong dang bye ba yis// bka' 'di mi nub chos kyi rgyu la mtshan btsugs/
262b4(ca): brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyal ba'i zhal chems bzhag/ thugs rje sprul sku shes rab rang byung ba// byams pas chos bstan gang la ci 'du pa// mos pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor bshad//
262b5(ca): snang gi sgra nyi zla kha sbyor las/ bka' mi nub rgyal mtshan gsung zhal chems bzhag pa'i le'u ste nga bdun pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs
262b6(ca): / rtsos seMs gaskyed phyir sgra yi rten// bat+sa dpe mtshon pha ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba rtogs pa bskyed pa sku yi rten// dbu yi gtsug nas ring bsrel
262b7(ca): chos su su kya mas mchos kyim man pa / ma ma rdzogs pa'i tha
263a1(ca): bzhag/ ba glang spyod du dga' ba brtsegs pa'i rang byung sku gdung bzhag/ sgra mi snyan du btang snyoms rgya gram brtsegs pa'i sku// shar gyi lus 'phags/
263a2(ca): byams pa rdo rje brtsegs pa'i sku gdung ba zhag/ de bzhi sku yi 'dra 'bag mtshon pa'i dpe bzhag go// sangs rgyas sku gsum bzhugs par dper mtshon no// sku gdung de las
263a3(ca): zer 'phros rten btsugs pa// rdo rje ga dan gyi phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du// sku yi brdar mtshon sku gdung phyogs bkod pa// ma ga d+ha yi dur khrod ba sil ba ru// ska
263a4(ca): gdung ring bsrel bde chen brtsegs pa byung // sing nga la yi dur khrod sku la rdzogs pa ru// sku gsung ri bo ta mas 'bar byung // kha che dur khrod he chen bad la// skye
263a5(ca): gdung ka ni ka ni rang byung byung // sa la ga sang che na rol pa'i dur khrod du// sku gdung 'og bu do shal byung // ba la yul dur khrod lhun grub brtsegs// mchod rten byar rung kha
263a6(ca): shor byung // oM r+yan du ra khrod pad+ma brtsegs// sku gdung gzi byin brtsegs// za ho ra dur khrod lang dkar brtsegs// sku gdung bde byed gzhon nu byung // li yul 'jig
263a7(ca): rten brtsegs pa'i dur khrod byung // sku gdung mgo na dar sha ma mo// skra gdung brgyad ni rnam par snang mdzad sprul pa ste// tri yog chos bstan rigs 'dzini phyi ba'i rtog pa
263b1(ca): bskyed/ dur khrod brgyad ni rnam shes dul brgyad brdar mtshon// dur ni sdud par byed pa la// khrod ni ye shes dbyings su rol// rdo rje gdan ni rig pa thugs kyi brdal//
263b2(ca): sangs rgyas thugs kyis zer 'phros rdo rje sems dpa' sprul// gsang sngags chos bstan// rigs 'dzin nang gi rtogs pa bskyed// de rnams zer du mchod rten chen
263b3(ca): po brgyad kyang spros// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa bskyed// rdo rje sems dpa'i smin mtshams mdzod spu nas// sangs rgyas mtha' yas mngon du byung //

263b5(ca): nas lha yi dbang po mkhar gyi yang rtse ra ni// ta ri ka ka bya ba'i rtse la babs// lha dang byang sems rnams kyi rtog pa bskyed// de nas rgya yi ri bo rtse lngar ba bas//
263b6(ca): bya ba sems rigs lnga mgon po'i rtogs pa bskyed// de nas rdo rje gdan gyi rtse la babs// d+harmA sid+d+hi mu tra a zhes smras// ro langs bde ba dga' rab rdo rje phyag tu
263b7(ca): babs/ paN+Di ta lnga brgya rtogs pa der bskyed// de nas te sa gangs la babs// dgra bcom lnga brgya'i rtog pa sel// ye shes ngo bo ston pas skal ldan rtog pa
264a1(ca): bskyed// rdo rje sems dpa' me long zhes pa ltar gzhag pa// sku yi zhal chems yid ches bskyed pa'i gdung // su 'chang skal ldan rtogs pa
264a2(ca): tshe 'dir bskyed// rdo rje sems dpa 'thugs kyi dpa la be'u nas// sangs rgyas 'jam da pa la dri med snying po rang byung sha ra// de yi thugs las nyi ma'i snying po shar// sku gsum dbyer med khyab bdal
264a3(ca): mkha' la gsal// yi ge med pa'i brda bzhi don du ni// nyi ma khang par gnas par bar snang gsal// 'gro drug skal ldan rnams kyi rtog pa sel// rnal 'byor rtogs ldan
264a4(ca): rnams la nges shes bskyed// 'jig rten sgron ma 'gro ba'i gdung ba sel// brgyad khri bzhi stong chos nyid ma dang sprod// bye ba dpag med sangs rgyas bstan pa mthar 'don//
264a5(ca): thabs dang shes rab brda mtshon nyid zla 'gro don mdzad// de yi 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yang // gling bzhi bye ba phrag brgyar 'gro don mdzad// snying po'i don ston mun pa'i rtog pa sel//

264b2(ca): gsal dri med ngang gi ngo bo la// gnyen pos mi shigs rkyen gyis mi 'gyur bas// dge dang sdig pa de yi spyod yul min// rang dbang thabs kyis rdzogs pas rtsal gsum lus la/

264b5(ca): pa'i las// gang dang gral ba rang sa lhun grub grol// bya bral ngang la gnas pa'i skal ldan ni// rdo rje mi 'chang sngags dang rdzas mi rten// dben par mi 'dug mchod gtor

265a3(ca): rdzogs smra ba sa ma yul las 'das// nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa ra la bzlas pa// sa rnams yebs kyis bcad pa'i mchong po che// snang srid gsal bar byed pas 'od zer

265a5(ca): ris nam mkha'i glong // yid bzhin nor bu 'dam nas thon bzhin gzhi rtsa chod// mi 'gyur dbyings kyi rig pa'i nyi ma shar// de nyid ye nas ji bzhin gnas pa ni// lus 'das

265b1(ca): nas/ re dogs rnam dag mtha' bral chos nyid bstan// rdo rje thugs la ye shes sku// tshig gcig mtshon pas don chen spungs// rnam dag lam chen bgrod med rang grol gnas// ma

266a1(ca): ge sgra yi rgyud las/ nam mkha' rnam dag dgongs pa'i le'u ste re gcig pa'o// // yang thugs rje byams pas bka'

266a6(ca): ba/ rtogs pa glong du su 'gris pa// 'di nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rang bzhin rnam dag sku gsum la// sgrub dang rtsol bas ma yin mkha' la nyi shar tshul//

266b1(ca): la// rtsol pas zer 'od gzhan la btsal min te// shes rab ska ga su ma rig par ye rdzogs la// rna ba mnyan te tshig rten sgrub pas min// skye 'gag bral ba'i snying po

266b3(ca): snying po ni// rig pa nyi ma'i snying po dus gsum rgyun du bzhugs// rnam rtog mi gnas ye shes dri med dang // de dang de nyid zung 'jug nyi zla kha sbyor glong // kun tu bzang po'i

266b5(ca): gcig dgongs pa la dor ba// skad cig glong gcig dril ba'i thugs rig pa// bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad rtogs pa'i rang shar te// nyi zla kha sbyor dgongs pa mthar

266b7(ca): chen kun 'byung ting 'dzin las bzhengs nas// rang byung ye shes yon tan zad med pa// sems nyid rin chen gter gyi dbyig ces bya// skyed med glong nas rang
267a1(ca): bzhin 'od gsal ba// bag chags sbubs nas sgron mar rang shar gsal// nam mkha'i glong nas nyi ma shar ba 'dra// sku gsum dbyer med gsal
267a2(ca): ba ye shes glong // gsal yang dngos med dag pa chu zla 'dra// snang la dngos med par snang gzha' tshon chu la// sku gsum rig pa'i ye shes rdo rje thugs// tsot+ti'i shing la gel ba'i
267a3(ca): 'bras bu dang // ye shes me tog 'bras bu ra bcas// 'gro ba dug lnga nad las sel ba'i sman// rang byung rang gnas nor bu rin po che// phyi nang snod bcud ngo bo rang la grol// gzhan
267a4(ca): las ltos gyur chos ma yin// glang chen 'dam du bying ba dang // 'gro ba ma rig rang bcings gnyis// gzhan gyis yang dag gang bar 'gyur// chos kyis yang dag don la brjod nus
267a5(ca): kyang / tshig gis yang dag don la gnas mi nus// de phyir dge sbyod rnam smin ye shes don la bsgribs// chos kyi blo yis spros bcad chos la gnas// man shel dag pa dri med
267a6(ca): ltar du rang rig zhog/ tha mal shes pa blo yis bcos pa ni// de yi mo bu rin chen 'dam du bying // ye shes rang snang ngo bor sha ra ba la// bslad par bya ba'i chos ni sgrib pa
267a7(ca): yin/ thabs kyi rgyal po stobs kyi rig pa shar// che ba'i yon tan gzhan la dpag tu med// rig pa'i ye shes chu bo rgyun gnas la// dngos po mtshan ma de la bar ma bcad// /
267b1(ca): chos rnams ye nas rang rtsal snang ba rtogs// nor bu dgos 'dod rang byung dgongs pa tshad du skyol// zhes seng ge sgra las/ nor bu rin po che dgongs pa'i le'u ste re gsum pa'o//
267b2(ca): / thugs rje byams pas bka' sprul pa// bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho glong yangs ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas// bde yo yangs so rgya mtsho'i
267b3(ca): glong / rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba ma 'dres so sor gsal// de bzhin chos nyid rnam dag spos bral rig pa'i ngang nyid la// skye med glong nas ye shes ma 'dres so sor gsal//
267b4(ca): sku gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho 'dra// a ti yangs pa'i glong na rnam dag pa// ye shes ngang las sprul pa'i skur bstan yang // thugs rje rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad de//
267b5(ca): rtsal 'khrul chos mi ni skad cig mngon sangs rgyas// de phyir sangs rgyas chos la gnas ma yin// chos ni sems de gnas pa'i rnam rtog yin// mtshon tshig byang chub chos
267b6(ca): rnams kyang // brdas 'grol tshig la byang chub don ma yin// kye rigs kyi bus nges par zung // de phyir mgon po dri med pas// sku gsum rang byung ye shes thugs
267b7(ca): rig pa/ chos la ma brten rang byung dbyings la sha ra// de phyir chos kyi sangs rgyas ma bshad de// chos ni tshig la 'brang zhing tshig la gnas// rang byung ye shes ngo bo
268a1(ca): tshig mtha' 'das// de phyir yang dag don la tshig med yi ge med// sems de tshig la brten nas bden lam tshol ba yang // chos rnams ngo bo ma
268a2(ca): bcings rang grol lo// ye shes rgyal ba tshig las 'das pa'i don// smra ba'i khyu mchog gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ nga ni dri med ye shes sku nyid la// dge sdig la 'das
268a3(ca): gdod nas snying po'i don// rtsol bas mtho dman 'bras bu sa rtsis 'das// nga nyid stong pa ye shes snying po can// bde sdug rang grol 'od gsal rig pa'i sku// dbyer med 'du
268a4(ca): 'bral med pa ngo bo nyid// rtsal gyi rol pa thugs rje rgyan shar ba// ma 'dres so sor gsal yang dbyer med rgya mtsho'i ngang // rgya mtsho glong yangs dgongs pa mthar skyol zhes//
268a5(ca): seng ge sgra yi dgongs pa'i rgyud nyi zla kha sbyor las/ rgya mtsho glong yangs dgongs pa'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi
268a6(ca): bdag bzhi lam 'bras bu'i gnas lugs la// so sor gnas lugs tha dad gcig/ sku gsum dngos dang dbye ba dang // lam pa'i gang zag rnams la ni// bdag dang
268a7(ca): rtogs pa'i don dang ni// dgongs pa rang shar gnas lugs dang // nyams su len pa'i lam rim rnams// tha dad gcig pa gsung du gsol// bka' stsal/
268b1(ca): pakye rdo rje 'dzin pa nges par rung // gzhi yi gnas lugs bstan pa ni// ma byung ma skyes sngon rol nas// thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med// kun gyi 'byung gnas
268b2(ca): chen por ni// khyab bdal nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// chos dbyings khyab bdal ye shes dngas ma'i sku// sa ni thabs mchog ldog pa'i gdangs// ma ni shes rab chos kyi
268b3(ca): dbyings// gdangs kyi snying po sku gsum rang la shar// lhun grub rang byung snying po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lo// bkod pa lha yi dkyil 'khor sgom mi dgos// nyi shu rtsa brgyad
268b4(ca): gnyis pa ni// ngo bo nyid la ngo bo nyi da shar ba// srog med longs sku rig lnga 'khor// sems dpa' sems ma dbang po yul shar ba// ma g.yos dbyings na gzha' tshon
268b5(ca): 'bar ba'i sku// gzha' tshon skyil krung ye shes snang ba lam me ba// gzhi sku rang byung gnas lugs spyi sa'o// lam pa'i gang zag rnams la ji ltar bzhugs pa ni// dkyil
268b6(ca): 'khor lnga yi dbu nyid la// mi gsal ba yi tshul du bzhug sa// snang srid dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor no// da lta sems de thams cad bzhugs// sgron ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor/
268b7(ca): na// rig pa chos sku zang thal bzhugs// tsit+ta thugs kyi dkyil 'khor na// longs sku rtsa brgyad gzha' tshon 'od gsal ba// kun tu bzang po chos nyid mi 'gyur ba// kha
269a1(ca): dog sna tshogs dbyings dang ye shes yab yum tshul// mnyam gzhag mtshon gang tshad du gnas// rtags kyi gsang sgo sgron ma mtshon gang ngo // rigs lnga
269a2(ca): thig le 'od la sa dngas ma'i rtsal du rdzogs// phung po lnga yis cha gzung mi gsal sku// phyag rgya dran rig tshor bar bcas pa'o// kun gzhi sems kyi me long gzung 'dzin dran rig
269a3(ca): pa/ 'od lnga pho brang ye shes lha yi gnas// 'jug pa sgo lnga thugs rje 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// sems dpa' sems ma zer du 'phros pas na// sems dpa'
269a4(ca): sems ma mi gsal zer la rol par bzhugs// 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes rtsal rdzogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug ye shes 'od gas la sku// de
269a5(ca): yi spru la sku thugs rje thub pa drug/ gang la gang 'dul chos can 'tsham par ston// mi gnas ye shes chos sku dbyings la thim pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos lnga dag
269a6(ca): tu mya ngan 'das// gzhi la lam du mi bkyer te// rang rig ma shar skyon du 'gyur// gzhi la 'bras bur mi bya ste// spyir yang 'khrul pa'i skyon du 'gyur// 'bras bu lam du
269a7(ca): mi bya ste// 'khor ba rang grol skyon du 'gyur// 'bras bu gzhir ni mi bya ste// ye shes mkhyen rtsal med par 'gyur// lam la gzhir ni mi bya ste// ye shes mtshon du med par 'gyur//
269b1(ca): lam la 'bras bur mi bkyer te// nyams blang rtsol med thal mar 'gyur// chos sku longs skur mi bshad de// chos sku gzhan snang rtog par 'gyur// chos sku sprul skur mi bshad
269b2(ca): de/ chos sku gdos bcas 'jig par 'gyur// longs sku chos skur mi bshad de// ye shes thugs rje stong par 'gyur// longs sku sprul skur mi bshad de// 'od snang chos dbyings rnam
269b3(ca): dag skyon// chos sku thugs su mi bshad de// de nyid thugs su bshad pa na// khyab bdal ye shes sku 'gag 'gyur// longs sku'i skur ni mi bshad do// dran rig gdos bcas skur
269b4(ca): mi 'gyur// sprul sku 'gro bar mi bshad do// thugs rje rdzu 'phrul med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thugs mchog rig pa dri med la// ngo bo stong pa gdangs 'od gsal// mtshan nyid
269b5(ca): dbyer med yon tan 'gyur ba med// sku ni dri med 'od gsal la// snang du yod la reg pa bral// sku gsum rang gi ngo bo ni// gcig pa ma yin tha dad min// de nyid gzhan du brjod med/
269b6(ca): nga / sku gsum 'bral med nyi ma'i zer 'od tshul// gcig dang gnyis pas tha dad grol bar gnas// brda don sprad pa'i ye shes rtogs pa dang // thugs kyi shes rig shar ba'i
269b7(ca): dgongs pa ni// gcig pa ma yin tha dad don mi rnyed// rgyal bas thabs kyi rim par bstan pa yin// rtogs pa'i blo de dgongs pa ma yin te// de nyid dgongs pa tha snyad tshig tu 'gyur//
270a1(ca): gdams ngag phrad pas ga la grol// nyams len dgongs pa ma yin te// dgongs pa dran rig glo bur 'gyur// 'dus byas dran rig ye shes rtog bral ga la
270a2(ca): thob/ dgongs pa rtogs pa ma yin te// ye nas rang shar lung dang 'gal// dgongs pa nyams len ma yin te// bya btsal bral ba'i lung dang 'gal// rtogs byed gdams ngag gzung
270a3(ca): 'dzin thabs// rang la shar ba brda phrad don// dgongs pa rang shar rig pa gsal// nyams len gzung 'dzin rang grol la// dran pa'i rgyun gyis 'od gas la bstan// dri med rig pa
270a4(ca): rang shar gsal// lam du byed pa nyams su len zhes bya// tha mal blo las grol ba'o// rig pa rang bzhin dag pa'i gsal ba dang // nam mkha' stong pa 'gag me dag sal ba ste//
270a5(ca): ye shes 'od gdangs 'od gsal gsal ba gsum// rig pa dri med nam mkha' 'gag med de// rig pa dri med 'od gdangs gsal ba med// gcig la min la tha dad min// gcig
270a6(ca): dang tha dad dag las grol bar gnas// nam mkha' rig med stong pa dang // 'od gdangs zer gyi gsal stong gnyis// gcig pa ma yin tha dad min// gcig dang tha dad dag las grol bar
270a7(ca): gnas/ rig pa rang gsal ngo bo ni// dpag dang gzhal la sa 'das pa'i 'od gsal rang shar ro// stong rig dbyer med 'od gsal rang bzhin te// 'gyur med sems de kun gyi
270b1(ca): smon mar gsal// zhes seng ge sgra'i dgongs pa las// gzhi 'bras lam pa'i rnam bshad le'u ste re lnga pa'o// kye/ bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi
270b2(ca): pa ga/ a ti don nyid bshad nas kyang // dgongs pa'i khyab pad la ji ltar lags// nges par nyams su gang lhur blang // dka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la/
270b3(ca): chos nyid dag pa nam mkha' kun la khyab// chos nyid dag pa'i nam mkha' la// rig pa ye shes nam mkha'i nyi ma shar// phyogs ris med pa kun tu 'od gsal ba// yid tu/
270b4(ca): rnam rtog ci byud ci 'gyur yang // ma pham mtsho la gser gyi nya mo ltar// chos nyid rig pa ye shes don la g.yos pa med// ma 'gags rig pa gnyis med 'od gsal ba/
270b5(ca): brtags de ngo bor gzung yang mthong rnyed rtogs bral med// zab mo'i cha shas rtog pa'i yul las 'das// man shel sku ltar rang rig rgyud dag pas// sgron ma phyi nyid gsal
270b6(ca): ba rig pa'i nang // dri med zang thal dag 'a chos kyi sku// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' snang ba yang // ma rtogs blol mtshan mar snang mod kyang // rtogs pa'i blol rang bzhin
270b7(ca): yongs kyi med// zang thal 'od gsal gdangs su spang ba shar// dper na nam mkhar snang ba gzha' tshan shar ba yang // mkha' las lags na med kyang logs pa snab
271a1(ca): rnams pa shed na gnas shing de las me gyud \u0f7f// lags khyis pa'i rna masas kyi// chas cid chos gyu byer med rnamam pa' /
271a2(ca): mar log rtog shar yang zang thal 'gag pa med// gsal la rtog med ye shes chos kyi sku// rang la rang gsal snod bcud ye sangs rgyas// las dang thugs rje mtha' gnyis rtogs pas rnam
271a3(ca): par dag/ sa dang rnam thar byang chub mchog la rig/ bgrod du med pa'i chos nyid byang chub lam// bgrod par 'dod pas ye shes mtha' la sgrib// ma bsags bzhin du tshogs gnyis ye
271a4(ca): rdzogs pas// ma sbyangs bzhin du sgrib gnyis ye dag la// ma skyed ma skyes 'od kyi pho brang nas// ye shes lha sku spyan drangs bzhugs mi dgos// rang shar rang snang dgongs par chod pa la//
271a5(ca): mi rtog stong nyid sems la dmigs mi dgos// a au hUM gi rang bzhin ni// zer 'od rgyun chad med par ye gnos pas// gsung gi bzlas pas rtsol ba bskyal mi dgos// 'gyur
271a6(ca): ba gzung 'dzin rang grol zang thal la// dug lnga bkag la dge ba spyad mi dgos// sku gsum 'od gsal ngo bor shar ba la// kun tu 'od la rim gyis bgrod mi dgos// ched du byar med ye
271a7(ca): nas lhun grub lam// dper na mar me snying po rang gi 'od la gnas pa ltar// rang rig 'od gsal ye shes rang gdangs gnas// 'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs rgyas kyang // gnyis
271b1(ca): med rogacig ye shes gdangs// skal ldan lam pa rnams kyang dgos bde la blta// gnyis med ro gcig chu la chu bzhag bzhin du grol// rang rig 'od gsal ye shes rang la
271b2(ca): 'char/ de las gud pa 'od gsal bzhan mi btsal// zhes seng ge sgra yi dgongs pa'i rgyud las/ dgongs pa'i khyab brdal 'gro 'ong kun la khyab par 'char ba'i
271b3(ca): le'u ste re drug pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ sku gsum gdangs kyi ye shes snang ba ste// skal ldan sgron mang po ji ltar
271b4(ca): gnas pa gsung du gsol// bka' stsa la pa/ yul dang yul can mi gcod de// skad cig rang gi sa 'od gsal ba// ngo bor mi 'dzin bag chags rjes mi bcod// bde sdug blo
271b5(ca): yis mi sdud rang ga dngas gsal ba'i ngang // ye shes rang shar sems las ma 'dres pa// sngar 'byung bzhin snang sems dang ma 'dres te// rtog pa 'khrul pa 'dzini pa gsum ma yin//
271b6(ca): phyis byung las 'bras sems dang ma 'dres te// nyon mongs bag chags sdug bsngal sems ma yin// da lta ngo bo sems dang ma 'dres pa// 'khrul snang log snang rnam shes blo zur
271b7(ca): sems ma yin// rang rig 'od gsal zang thal rang shar de// yid min sems min skad cig rang gsal ba// so sor rang rig mi g.yo bde ba che// de ying sprod rang bzhin bstan pa
272a1(ca): ni/ bla ma'i brda yis ston pa'i tshig/ phyi snang ba zlum pang thal smad pas ni// 'khrul parang grol skyu ga sum 'odag dngas 'char// bar sman mo'i gdangs la
272a2(ca): sprad pas// nyon mongs gdos bcas ye shes ngang du grol// nang sku gsum skad cig ngo sprad pas// ting gsal rig pa 'od gsal gdangs la lhag gis rtogs// sprad thabs phyi nas/
272a3(ca): blo yis ngo sprad nas// lam du sgron ma'i ye shes gdang sa la bkyer// rtogs pa'i mkhyen pa ye shes nang gsal 'char// sku gsum rig pa'i ye shes la// chos sku ngo bo
272a4(ca): nyid du rang zhal rang gis mthong // sems can dus na sangs rgyas dgongs pa chod// dus ma 'gyur bar sor snang zang thal 'gyur// mngon shes rang rig rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang 'char
272a5(ca): de dus rgyu ba ye shes shar ba'i snang ba la// gnyis su med pa'i spyod pas yi dam lus blangs la// rig spyod gnyis su med pas mkha' spyod grol// ye shes rtogs lugs rang bzhin
272a6(ca): ni/ ta phyi rig pa'i snang ba zang thal sang nger rtogs// bag chags gdos bcas 'dzin rtog rang sar grol// 'gro drug lus su skye gnas mtshams mi sbyor// bar nyon mongs sgron mar
272a7(ca): 'od gsal bas// hri ga ge sa le ma rig dbyings su dag/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes ngang la gsal yang btab// nang gzung 'dzin zang thal rig par grol// sku gsum lhag ge spros
272b1(ca): bral rig pa'i gdangs// ye shes snying po rdo rje 'chang gi srog tu zin// des kun tu 'od la sku gsum mthar ma skyol// skal ldan sgron ma lta stangs rang bzhin no// ye shes gdangs
272b2(ca): la rtsol ba grogs su mi bkye ra te// rig pa rtsal dang bcas pas gdangs stod la// chos sku rang dang chas pas sa la blta// 'od gsal gdangs sgron mas hu re bltas pa'i tshe// snang
272b3(ca): ba ma dang sa thon zang thal 'od la lhag ger 'char// rtog pa rags pa dag pa'i mi rtog ye shes la// chos nyid rang gdang sa 'od snang 'char ba nges// rtog pa phra ba dag pa'i rang rig ye/
272b4(ca): shes la/ mkha' 'gro rig pa'i snang ba mngon shes rdzu 'phrul 'char// bag la nyal ba rang grol ba'i snang ba las// snying po ches min ye shes chen po 'char// spyi dang rang gi mtshan
272b5(ca): nyid gsal bar mkhyen// phyi nang rig pa gdangs kyi rang bzhin ni// phyi yi snang ba 'od gdangs dang // bar sgo lnga ye shes zer gdangs dang // nang sku gsum rig pa'i rang gdangs
272b6(ca): ni/ dbyer med gcig ste rtsal gyi ngang // gcig pa ma yin tha dad min// gcig dang tha dad dag las grol bar gnas// ye shes chen po'i gdangs su gsal// chos nyid mkha' la shar
272b7(ca): ba'i tshe/ phyi nyid nang la nang nyid phyi// rig pa rang ngo shar ba'i dgongs par nges// ngang la rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po'i don// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// ye shes gsal ba'i
273a1(ca): sgron ma chu// rtog dang bral ba'i rig pa gsal// dbyer med 'od gsal mi rtog pa// ma bcos rang shar dgongs pa'i ngang du zhes// rang bzhin dag pa'i
273a2(ca): nam mkhanya dang // chos nyid dag pa'i nam mkha' dang // rig pa gsal ba'i nam mkha' gsum// dbyer med stong zhing bdag med pas// dgongs pa rang shar sku gsum rang bzhin
273a3(ca): zhes su bya// rang rig ye shes gsal ba dang // rang bzhin gdangs gsal nam mkha' la// ma 'gags sgron ma'i gdangs gsal ba// gsal bzang thal rang bzhin stong //
273a4(ca): dbyer med dgongs pa'i bdag nyid chen po'o// mdor na ye shes rang shar ngo bo ni// sku gsum ye shes snying po rig par gnas// rig pa'i ye shes nam mkha'i gdangs la sgron
273a5(ca): / mar gsal// sku gsum lhun grub rig pa'i thig le 'od gsal bas// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog phra rags 'khor ba'i sa bon no// bag la nyal sogs ye shes ngo bor grol// rang
273a6(ca): rig spro sgra bral ye shes chos kyi sku// sku gsum mkhyen pa mtha' ru bskyal nas ni// mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam lnga de ru 'char// shes bya phyi nang med par rang grol mkhyen// zhes
273a7(ca): seng ge sgra'i dgongs pa theg dman zil gyis gnon pa nyi zla kha sbyor rgyud las/ skal ldan ye shes rang shar ba'i don rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o// /
273b1(ca): kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ sems can log snang ye shes gdangs 'khrul pa// yul snang ma rig gzung 'dzin rtas// bag chags las kyis mtha'

273b3(ca): papor zung // ga dang sa la rig pa 'khrul pa ni// rig pa ma 'khrul zer gyi 'dzin pa 'khrul// ra ba rib can gyi mig bu bzhin// med par log snang 'dzan pa zhags// dngos
273b4(ca): su grub pa ma yin te// rtog pa rags pa phyi nang dang // bar gyi nyon mongs nang gi gzung 'dzin rten// gdos bcas bag chags sha khrag sbubs kyis 'gro drug 'khor bar brgyud//
273b5(ca): de yis 'gro drug sdug bsngal lam la spyod// phyi rgya nang rgya gsang ba rgya// rgyu gsum rang sar grol ba'i gdams ngag ni// rgya gsum rang grol kha sprod khrid kyis bstan// sgyu
273b6(ca): ma rmi lam gzhab chen tshul du ni// snang stong dngos med rang bzhin blta// rtogs par gyur pa'i skal ldan ni// snang bzang thal dngos med pas// rig pa'i rang gdangs bing
273b7(ca): du grol/ zhes seng ge sgra dgongs pa las/ rtogs pargya 'grol le'u ste ro brgyad pa'o// / kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ sgyu mar
274a1(ca): dusnang ba 'dzin ltar blta// zhes pa bka' stsal pa/ 'od snang rtogs brtas pas dngos med sgyu ma 'jig/ 'byung snang dus kyi sgyu ma dbyar dgun lo zlar
274a2(ca): 'gyurate/ tu rang bzhin rdul 'dus zang thal sgyu ma dngos ma grub// rmi lam lam pas blta ba ni// rmi lam rtag par snang ba bden pa'i dus// 'khrul par snang ba rmi lam rdzun pa'i
274a3(ca): du sa/ rmi lam 'od gsal zang thal rtog pa'i dus// sems kyi byung tshor gzha' tshon bzhin du blta ba ni// sems rtog 'gyur ba mi rtag rang rgyud 'dzin pa'i dus// sems
274a4(ca): rtog 'gyur ba mi rtag dus// de nyid rig pa 'od gsal gdangs su grol ba'o// de ltar phyi nang rtogs bcas nyon mongs dang // nang gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa ye shes gdangs la

274a7(ca): rtogs pas ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsal pa/ rtag pas sgyu ma mi rtogs chad pas de mi rtogs// dbu ma stong pas sgyu ma'i don mi rtogs// sgyu ma'i don nyid rtogs par
274b1(ca): dka' ba ni// sangs rgyas brgyud pa med pa'i gang zag la// bka' lung blo sa bcos lung thos sgyu ma'i don mi rtogs// log rtog snang ba sgyu ma ngo bo yin yang rtog pas
274b2(ca): bsgribs// rmi lam sgyu ma sad pas rtog pa sel ba ltar// bla mas sgyu ma'i snang ba ngo sprod gces// sna tshogs sgyu mar rtogs pa rgyal ba kun gyi lam// sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes
274b3(ca): snang ba la// sgyu mar mtshon pa'i gdams ngag tshig brjod pas// mi 'gyur rig pa'i don nyid brtan par rtogs// rang byung ye shes sku gsum sgyu ma la// snang du yod la reg tu
274b4(ca): med par ngo yang spyad// ting 'dzin rtsa la skyong nyams len rnams// ye shes sgyu ma'i rol pa rang shar brtag/ spyod pa'i dus su gnyis med sgyu mar blta// 'khrul rtog phra
274b5(ca): rags gzung 'dzin kun// sgyu ma rmi lamango bor dngos med rtog pa sel// skye 'jig lam pa'i sems can rol pa sgyu ma'i ngang // bskyed rim khams dang skye mched sgyu ma la//
274b6(ca): 'chi ba khams dang skye mched rdzogs rim mo// bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug ye shes sgyu ma'i 'od// rang rig sangs rgyas ngo bo la// rtog go'i yul min bka' 'di bstan// lam
274b7(ca): parang rig sprul sku thugs rje dang // chos nyid bor de chos sku khyab bdal la// ye shes rtogs par shar ba longs spyod sku// gar yang gyur yang rol snang sgyu ma'i ngang /
275a1(ca): 'khor ba'i rnam sprul sku gsum sgyu ma rol pa'i rtsa la// dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis cir sprul yang // dngos su ma grub stong nyid sgyu ma'i ngang // sgyu
275a2(ca): ma mkhan gyi rol pa'i rtsal du shar// 'khor 'das dbyer med sku gsum rol pa'i rgyan// zhes seng ge sgra'i dgongs pa las/ sgyu ma'i ye shes kyis rtog 'dzin des
275a3(ca): gcad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ lam pa'i rnal 'byor skal ldan la// nyams su blangs na
275a4(ca): ji lta bu/ ma blangs skyon ni gang ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ rang byung ye shes gnas lugs la// rtogs pas nyams su ma blangs na// lam la gnas pa'i gang
275a5(ca): zag ni/ tA sku gsum lhun grub yin mod kyang // da rung ye shes rtsal ma rdzogs// bag chags sbubs su yang brgyud srid// gang zag rtsol bas mi sgrub na// rtogs pa'i
275a6(ca): tshig la 'chel ba ni// dper na rgyal po'i dkor mdzod la// dbul pos bsngos kyi na btab kyang ni// 'byor pa'i longs spyad thob mi 'gyur// de bzhin ye shes bzhi yi/
275a7(ca): don ta ta brtson pas nyams su ma blangs na// ye shes mkhyen pa rtsa la mi rdzogs// sku gsum sbubs la zha bar 'gyur// ye shes gzung 'dzin ngang la yal// nges pa'i
275b1(ca): 'bras bu mi thob pas// ma rig ma tshang can skyar la gdon// gzung 'dzin smon pa lam du gzung // gzhon nu rig pa gdong la blta// yul dang gzung 'dzin sngo brug ya
275b2(ca): nga bral/ ta lu sa ngag yid gsum 'dod yon lngas mi g.yeng // rnam she sa l-I ni dug lnga'i dbang mi gtang // 'dus byas kha 'dzin bya ba gtang // thos phros 'gyu byed btson
275b3(ca): ra gzung // dngos kyi rtog bcas dge sdig lam du mi bya zhing // bden dang rtag pa'i ngo bo stong nyid mi sgom ste// rtsol bas 'ching ba'i don la sbyor ba ma yin pas//
275b4(ca): chos sku mtshan mar mi lta bar// rnal 'byor zag med shes rab kyis// nam mkha' bzhin du dngos bral lta// rang rig nyams su len pa ni// ye shes rang bzhin
275b5(ca): 'gag med la// rang snang rang sha ra gzung 'dzin bral// me long gzugs brnyan ltar du smad// rtog pas nyams su blang ba ni// bya bral lhun rdzogs gshog rgyangs 'dra//
275b6(ca): rang rig rang gsal ngang la gnas// dgongs pa ye shes nyams len ni// dper na chu bo gang+gA bzhin// rgyun gyi ngang la nyams su blang // 'bras bu la zlos nyams le na ni//
275b7(ca): nyi ma'i 'od zer shar ba bzhin// sku gsum 'bral med ngang la blang // rnal 'byor lam gyi nyi mas len ni// shes rab chen po don las ni// dgongs pa ma yengs nyams
276a1(ca): su thung / rnal 'byor lus kyi nyams blang gA/ dang por dben par sems gzung nas// rtogs nas rig pa'i rdul sbyang ste// nges shes
276a2(ca): rtogs pa shar na gnyis med spyod pa bya// zhes seng ge sgra dgongs pa'i rgyud las/ nyams su long zhig par gdams pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o// /
276a3(ca): / kye tabacom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ nyams su blang ba'i gang zag rnams// cig car rtogs sa ma rim gyi sa bgrod// rtsol bas grub bam btsal
276a4(ca): med shar// bka' stsal pa/ a ti cig car rtogs pa'i dgongs pa yang // yin don cig car rig pa'i don// ga rtogs dus grol dus su rim gyis dpyad//
276a5(ca): dbang po bag chags lus 'di ga cud la sgril// dbang po rang yan bkug pas rtogs grol bde ba lus la 'char// bar du gsengs la shes rig dang la gcu// de
276a6(ca): lus ngag gi byin rlabs nus pa skyes// tha ma shes pa glod la 'gyu ba rang ya na gtang // gzung 'dzin gcud la bor bas rig pa rang gsal 'char// shar ba'i tshe na
276a7(ca): lhag de rang dgar mthong // lhag ge sa le ngang la 'bral med bya// 'di ni ye shes rang yan bde ba chen po'i grong // rang byung ye shes chos su gzhi bzhengs la/
276b1(ca): lta ba rtogs pas 'di la ci zhig lta// rig pa 'od gsal lam du shar ba la// sgom pa'i sems 'dzin 'di la ci zhig sgom// kun tu bzang po dog pa me da dbyings
276b2(ca): la/ ta rig pa'i rgyal po'i ngang la rang grol thabs// spyod pa dka' thub 'di la ci zhig bya// snying po sku gsum lhun grub rang chas khyab// rtsol ba sa bgrod nas 'bras bu ci zhig tshol//
276b3(ca): dgongs pas mtshan ma rang grol te// nyams la dus mi 'gyur yang snang ba 'gyur// bde chen ye shes shar ba'i drod chad yin// chos sku ye shes sgo lnga rang shar la// snang ba ngo bar
276b4(ca): dag pas rtsal snang rang grol lo// dgongs pa rang la shar bas shes rab rgyun// bag chags bag la zha bas sgrib med lung // snang ba rnam dag gzhi snang chen po la// rang byung ska
276b5(ca): gsum byas pa'i chos ma yin// 'od gsal sgrib med rtog pa med// sku gsum rang la rdzogs pas 'bras bu rtsol ba med// snying po nang gsal chos sku'i snang ba la// sgo lnga 'od
276b6(ca): gsal longs sku yul snang ngo // sprul pa'i snang ba ye shes zang thal te// shar ba thams cad sgrib med ye shes bkrag/ snang ba thams cad dngos med 'od gsal gdangs//
276b7(ca): nyams len thams cad ma bcos 'od gsal dang // rtog pa thams cad zang thal nam mkha'i mtha'// lus ngag spyod pa rang shugs par snang rlung // yon tan thams cad ma
277a1(ca): btsal rgya mtsho'i rlabs// 'bras bu sgrub med ye shes nyi ma'i dkyil// 'khor ba rang grol byang chub rin chen gling // rtogs ldan la don ji ltar spyad kyang snying
277a2(ca): po'i don// 'khor bdas thams cad chos sku 'gag med rtsa la// 'on kyang gzung 'dzin rtag par lta bas 'khor bar 'ching // seng ge sgra las/ dgongs pa bcab pa'i le'u ste don
277a3(ca): gnyis pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ dus bzhi mnyam par ji ltar sbyar// bka' stsal pa/ rig pa lta bu bag chags
277a4(ca): sbubs na gsal dus su// chos sku bag chags sbubs na 'thums zhes bya// longs sku tsit+ta dpal be'u'i nang gsal ba// sprul sku 'dod pa'i sgo gsum rang grol yang // sku gsum
277a5(ca): gdangs kyi 'od gas la sgo lngar zang thal shar// shar ba gsal ba ngo ma shes pas sgrib pa byung // zang thal ngo ma shes pas rtog par bzung // rang grol ngo ma shes pas sdug bsngal
277a6(ca): rgyud la bsags// snying po ye shes gsal ba'i gnad kyis sgrib pa med// thugs kyi rtsa la rdzogs snang ba zang thal 'khrul pa med// sku yi rtsa la rdzogs longs sku ngo bor shar// rang
277a7(ca): grol 'od gsal shar bas sdug bsngal gdung ba grol// ngo bo 'gyur med chos sku rang sa zin// 'od gsal rang la shar bas sgrib pa yongs su dag/ de yi dus su dus bzhi mnyam
277b1(ca): par nyams su blangs pa ni// dbang po gnas sdud phyi sgo gcad pa'i dus// de mtshon rang grol rang rig rtogs// shes bya bum 'jug ye shes nang gsal dus// bying rmugs gti
277b2(ca): mug ye shes ngang la bzla// rig pa rang gsal ye shes nang sgo 'byed pa'i dus// ye shes rang snang rang rtsal phyal bar mi gtong ba// snang brgya yan rtogs gsal zang thal
277b3(ca): dus/ 'khrul rtog ye shes ngo bor shar bas zhen pa'i skyon yang bsal// nyin mtshan kha sbyor chu bo rgyun gyi gnas// 'khrul pa gzung 'dzin ngo bar mtha' grol ba'o// mtshan
277b4(ca): mo gti mug yid lus la// 'khrul pa yid 'khrul rmi lam dus// mthong snang rig byed rang snang rang grol gces// de don ma rtogs ri dgas smig rgyu ba ded pa 'dra// 'khrul pa
277b5(ca): da lta sha khrag lus 'di la// ye shes rang shar snang ba rang gro la gces// de don ma rtogs rtog ge chos rnams spyod pa ni// bye rdzab 'dam rdzab bsnan dang 'dra ste skam dus
277b6(ca): med/ bar du 'od gsal lus la ni// 'od gsal rtogs pa'i gzer med na// dmus long thang la gcod pa 'dra// bag chags le lo thibs non nas// byin pa'i yul med
277b7(ca): srid pa'i bar dor 'khyam par 'gyur// zhes seng ge sgra'i dgongs pa las dus bzhi mnyam par dgongs pa sbyor ba'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o// /
278a1(ca): kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ dgongs pa dus bzhi mnyam par sbyar byas nas// dgongs pa nyams kyi drod rtags ji ltar 'byung //
278a2(ca): bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor sku gsum ji ltar yid ches nga // sems can dus na sangs rgyas dgongs par shar// 'khor ba'i blo la 'khrul pa rang ngor log/ dus la 'gyu ba med kyang ye
278a3(ca): shes snang ba 'char// 'khrul pa nga bdag snang ba ngo bar zad// 'jig rten gnas kyang kun tu 'od kyis non te// 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal bde ba chen por grol// mngon shes phra mo med
278a4(ca): kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes rab shar// 'khrul pa rang dag 'khor ba rgyun chad do// der brda don sprad pas rang ngo shes// 'gro don las la mtshams mi sbyor// ma rig dbyings
278a5(ca): su dag nas mkhyen pa'i 'char sgo bye// sku gsum snying po 'gyur med pas// 'dzin rtog zang thal shar bas rdzu 'phrul mngon shes ldan// phyi yi snang ba dag snang 'gro drug sgyu mar grol//
278a6(ca): 'gro drug skye gnas 'khor ba'i sgo yang 'gags// thugs rje 'od du gsal bas 'gyu byed rtog sgrib dag/ 'khor ba skye ba'i rkyen med mngon sangs rgyas// chos sku rang ngo shes
278a7(ca): pas rtogs pa'i yul la shes rab shar// ma rig rig par dag pas mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob// thugs rje zer du 'phro bas rdzu 'phrul rtsa la yang rdzogs// longs sku rang la
278b1(ca): shar bas ye shes ngang lags la// thugs kyi rtsa la rdzogs mkhyen pa gsum yang shar// 'gag med gsung gi rtsal rdzogs chos rnams thogs med mkhyen// rnal 'byor lam
278b2(ca): gyi drod tshad mtha' ru skyol// zhes seng ge sgra la sa/ rnal 'byor drod tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs
278b3(ca): kyi bdag/ nyams su blang dus ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor nyams su len dus lnga// da lta 'khrul pa'i snang ba la// rang snang ye shes lam du bkye //
278b4(ca): thun mong ting 'dzin gsal ba las// ye shes rang shar lam du bkyer// rmi lam snang ba nyid 'khrul la// ye shes sgyu mas ye shes sgyu ma blta// chos nyid par do dag pa'i
278b5(ca): snang ba la// sangs rgyas bden pa'i rang sa de ltar gzung // der mkhyen pa'i gsal mthebs na// blod man srid pa'i bar dor ye shes skabs gdab bya// rtogs pa tha ma
278b6(ca): skye ba rgyud las grol bar 'gyur// ye shes rang snang lam du byed pa ni// 'dug yang chos nyid gdangs las ma g.yos la// 'gro yang ye shes rang gdangs rang snang ma
278b7(ca): 'gags te// nyi ma mer ma rang snang gdangs dang chas nas 'gro ba bzhin// nyal yang rig pa'i ngang las ma g.yos grong // nang nub rig pa zang thal rtsal gyi ngang /
279a1(ca): la 'dug/ gzung 'dzin phra rags dngos med rang ngo grol// mtshan ma rang sar grol ba ye shes rnal 'byor che// spyod lam rnam bzhi ci spyad kyang // ye
279a2(ca): shes gdangs las mi 'da' zhing // chos nyid ngang las ma g.yos pas// bya gar 'phur mkha' las mi 'da' ltar// rtogs ldan rnal 'byor dang las g.yos pa med// ces seng
279a3(ca): ge sgra'i dgongs pa las/ rnal 'byor nyams myong dus bstan pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ rnal 'byor
279a4(ca): lam gyi rnam gzhag tu// sku gsum dang po ye shes rtsal du gang las byung // gnas dang grol ba'i rim pa ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ thog ma rang rig chos sku ngo bo las//
279a5(ca): ye shes rtsal lnga thog ma gang las shar// 'di nyid rigs kyi bu yis nges par zung // shes rab rtsa la ni ma btsal rang shar te// dang po byung yang sku gsum rtsal las byung //
279a6(ca): bar du gnas yang shes rab rtsal la/ gnas// tha ma grol yang 'dus thim sku gsum ngang du grol// ma btsal rang shar lnga nyid bshad pa ni// rig pa chos nyid stong pa dang //
279a7(ca): de nyid 'gag pa med pa dang // de gnyis dbye ba med pa dang // de ltar shes pa'i shes rab dang // de las thogs med 'od zer lnga// de lnga mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes
279b1(ca): shar ra// ye shes ldan 'od lngar shar ba yin// 'od lnga rigs lnga longs su ltar shar ro// rigs sdu dbyings la yum lnga ma 'gags shar// yab yum sems dpa' sems
279b2(ca): ma ma 'gags te// sems dpa' sems ma dbang po ma 'gags pa// de ni ye shes rang shar dgongs pa'o// rang shar rang snang gzhan snang rtog pa de la med// de ltar 'byung lnga phung
279b3(ca): po sgo lnga dang // rig pa 'od gsal dbyer med rtsal gyi gdang sa las shar// de nyid ye shes gdangs su rtogs pa ni// bla mas gdams ngag rkyen gyis snang bas na// khyod kyang

279b5(ca): sems can bag chags sbubs kyis bcad mod kyang // don gyi ye shes sgo lnga zang thal shar// rtog pa'i ye shes sgrib med zang thal lo// de phyir rnal 'byor sku gsum yin pa'i
279b6(ca): nga las bdag med do// de yi ngang la dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs// 'byed med gsal ba shes rab rtogs pa med// de yi chos sku rig pa'i rang sa zin// stong nyid rdo rje/

280a1(ca): shes kyi rtsal gang las byung ba dang / bar du sangs rgyas sems can ji ltar gnas pa'i le'u ste don drug pa'o// bcom

280a7(ca): gsal ngo bor mched// thim dang grol ba ye shes ngang du sdud// dper na nam mkha' sprin dang khu rlang ci byung yang // nam mkha'i ngang byung gnas thim nam mkha' bzhin// skal
280b1(ca): ldan rnal 'byor sku gsum ngang nas sku gsum glong du skye la// dbang po ya rab gyur pa la// ye nas zang thal chen po bas// bar do med cing skad cig med// da lha nyid du lus

280b3(ca): gsal sgo zang thal 'od gsal lo// dper na nam mkha' zang thal phyi nang med pa la// khang khyim ra bar byas pas nam mkha' gud du bcad// khang khyim nang gi nam mkha' dang //
280b4(ca): rang bzhin khyab pa'i nam mkha' gnyis// mthongs kyi nang na gnyis med sgrib med zang thal lta ra// bag chags sha khrag sbubs kyi rig pa dang // chos nyid ye shes dbyings kyi
280b5(ca): rig pa gnyis// ye shes sgron ma'i sgo yis mtshams sbyar nas// ye shes zang thal chen po rtogs pa yis// bar do skye dang 'gag med par// thabs ma 'gags pa'i ye

280b7(ca): kyi snang ba 'od snang shar// mkha' 'gro snang ba gzha' tshon las// longs sku tshom bu mkhyen pa rang la shar// chos nyid snang ba chos sku bad la khyab mthong // rtsol bas
281a1(ca): rtogs par rdzogs par mngon sangs tshe 'dir rgyas// snang ba rgyas 'debs pa dgongs pa des mthar stsol// zhes seng ge sgra yi dgongs pa'i rgyud

281a6(ca): 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'di// dang po rang la shar bas na// tha ma rang gi ngang du grol// gzhan snang 'khrul pa 'gags dus su// mtshan ma rang sar grol gyur pa// 'byung ba'i
281a7(ca): rang rtsal bzhir 'dus te// yul lnga sgo lnga'i gnas su sdud// sgo lnga 'byung ba lnga la sdud// 'byung lnga yum lnga bum pa'i dbyings su sdud// gzung 'dzin sems rtog ye shes lnga la
281b1(ca): sdud/ ye shes gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ngo bo chos kyi ska// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba rang gdang sa bod du 'dus// mkha' la gzha' tshon gsal ba lta bu de// ye shes gsal
281b2(ca): ba mtha' dbus med par khyab// de tshe rin che na nyi zla khe sbyor glong na ba zhugs// 'byed me da shes rab ye shes glong dril nas// skad cig dang po bag chag sa sbubs na gnas dus
281b3(ca): rig pa 'od la 'jug pa bstan pa ni// dngas ma 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// chos nyid snying po'i 'od la shar// phyi yi snang ba'i 'byung ba lnga// mi snang rang rung

281b7(ca): sha khrag sbubs nas ni// ye shes sbubs su 'pho ba la// rtags kyi rim pa ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi 'byung ba thim zhing 'du// sa nyid sa thim 'degs pa'i
282a1(ca): durtsa la nyam sa te// lus lI shes pa thim pa yi ne// de nas chu la chu thim ste// sdud pa'i nus nyam sa kha sna skam la med// me la me thim drod nya mas
282a2(ca): ba/ lus kyi drod 'pho rkang pa grang // rlung la rlung thim g.yo ba'i nus pa nyams// lus kyi shes pa rdib cing skyed pa'i nus pa nyams// rnam shes nam mkhar thim nas tshor ba bde
282a3(ca): sdug rtog bral lo// 'byung ba thim pas 'khrul pa 'gag pa ni// 'degs pa sa yi rlung ni tshogs pa la gnas te// de nyid nyams pa sa 'degs pa'i nus pa med// chu yi rlung ni
282a4(ca): lus kun bkrag dang gzi mdangs gnas// de nyams bkrag dang gzi nyams mdangs med lus phra 'dar// me dang mnyam rlung pho bar gnas te drod 'tshor zas mi 'ju// rlung gi rlung
282a5(ca): ni steng sgo 'og sgor gnas bcas nas// dngas snyigs 'byed de thig le dri chu mchil snabs 'dor// de nyams sha sa lI shes pa bying la myos// snying rje med pa las kyi rlung zhes pa//
282a6(ca): 'khor rlung srog rtsa glo nas rgyu ba ste// srog 'dzin yin pas ji srid gnas par srog 'dzin no// rnam shes rig pa ye shes rlung // skyod pa tsit+ta sgron mar spyod byed do// 'od lam dar skud
282a7(ca): rtsa nas spyod// rtags kyi gsang sgor phyin pa dang // dper na shar rir nyi shar bas// 'od nyid nub rir 'byung ba ltar// phyi yul zer 'od snang ba ni// rig pa ye shes sgron ma nas// /
282b1(ca): chos nyid nam mkha' yul gsal 'od// ye shes 'od zer zang thal ba// thugs rje 'od kyi rgyun lam 'char// rang gi gdangs la zer 'phro ba// skar ma lta bu'i snang ba 'am// srin
282b2(ca): bu me khyer du ba 'am// gzha' 'am smig rgyu lta bur zer phran 'char// zhes seng ge sgra las/ 'byung ba rtags kyi le'u ste don dgu pa'o// // kye ta bcom
282b3(ca): ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ 'byung ba'i 'chi rtags shar nas ni// dbang po so so snang ba yin// 'khrul pa yul snang ji ltar 'gag/ ye shes bzhi la 'bros pa'i rtags// rlung rnams
282b4(ca): rim gyis zhi gyur nas// las kyi rlung gis ye shes mkha' la skyod// 'chi bdag rlung gi grong khyer nas// bdud kyi so pa chas sam brtag/ lus kyi dbang po sa yi rlung 'gags
282b5(ca): pasaHta spyod lam rnams 'gag ngo tsha bral bar byed// lce yi dbang po rlung nyams pas// zas kyi ro yi tshor ba 'gag/ sna yi dbang po me yi rlung nyams pas// dri yang tshor bar mi
282b6(ca): 'gyur la// dbugs kyang rab tu thung zhing rtseg/ rna ba'i dbang po rlung nyams pas// sgra yang mi thos log sgrar thos// rnam shes nam mkha'i rlung nyams pas// gzugs
282b7(ca): 'gag mi ngo shes par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung ba lnga yang dang sa ma lnga la 'dus// dang sa ma lnga nyid longs sku 'od la 'du// sa yi dngas mnya mig tsam// rdo rje sems dpa'
283a1(ca): 'od zer dkar por thim// chu yi dngas ma bye'u lan pa'i mgo tsam la// rin chen 'byung ldan 'od zer ser por thim// drod kyi dang sa ma me long nyid 'od
283a2(ca): tsamaHsnang ba mtha' yas 'od zer dmar por thim// rlung gi dang sa ma gser sa 'og ngad pa tsam// don yod grub pa 'od zer ljang khur thim// 'byung ba 'od la 'dus te/
283a3(ca): rigs lnga chos skur thim// de nas ye shes sku gsum 'dzin pa'i zer rlung dang // las rlung 'byung ba srog 'dzin snying rje med pa gnyis// thag pa zer du chad nas dbugs ni sna sgor
283a4(ca): 'das/ rig pa chos sku sgron mar zer zhon nas// sgron ma 'od zhon chos sku chos nyid mkha' la bskyod// gcig skye gcig 'gag ye shes snang ba 'phreng ba brgyud pa'i tshul// de tshe
283a5(ca): chos nyid ngo bo nyid// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' dang // gnyis med gcig med don nyid khyab bdal lo// zhes seng ge sgra'i dgongs pa nyi zla kha sbyor las/ snang ba 'gag
283a6(ca): pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ ye shes gdangs kyi rim pa'i snang ba ji ltar 'char// bka' sku la ba
283a7(ca): chos sku sgron ma yul nas ye shes lam zhon nas// chos nyid par dor rang snang rim par rdzogs tshul na// dang por rang bzhin rim par 'char// zla 'od shar ba lta bu ste/
283b1(ca): sgyu yal pa'am dkar yal 'od 'char ro// de phyir rtog pa bzhi bcu 'gag par 'gyur// de nas mched pa'i 'od gsal ni// ye shes snang ba gzha' ltar kha dog lnga// skad cig dang
283b2(ca): po mthing kha yul du 'char// rig pa ngos gzung bral ba chos kyi dbyings// ye shes rang shar snang ba gsal// de nas skad cig gnyis pa la// dkar po yul du snang ba'i tshe//
283b3(ca): rig pa 'gag min me long ye shes chod// skad cig gsum la ser po yul du snang // rig stong dbyer med mnyam nyid ye shes chod// skad cig bzhi la 'od gdangs dmar po yul du
283b4(ca): snang ba'i tshe// so sor rtog pa ye shes ga dngas su chod// skad cig lnga la ljang khu yul du snang ba'i tshe// rang snang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes gdangs su chod// ye shes
283b5(ca): mched pa'i snang ba rim gyi skye ba na ma langs 'dra// chos pa rtogs pa re re thad kar chod// gzung 'dzini rtog pa med pas shes bya gud gcod med// de nang rtog pa sum cu rtsa gsum
283b6(ca): 'gag pa'o// ye shes lnga yi snang ba rdzogs nas thob pa'i 'od gsal ni// shes rab kyi ngo bo mthar phyin pa// skad cig chos nyid 'od gsal dkyil 'khor na// thob pa'i mi
283b7(ca): shes 'od gsal sku gsum lhun mnyam pa// phyag rgya ma 'gags gzhi rdzogs chos kyi sku// ye shes sgo lnga ma 'gags nyi ma shar ba lta bur thob// thob pas gsang rtog bu bdun
284a1(ca): 'gags so// de nas chos nyid par do thob pa'i 'od gsal zhes su bya// seng ge sgra sgrogs theg dman zil gyis gnon pa nyi zla kha sbyor rgyud las
284a2(ca): ye shes snang ba 'char ba'i le'u ste bya gcig pa'o// / kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ chos nyid bar do de nyid las// rtogs pa'i
284a3(ca): shes rab skal ldan rang shar bas// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rdzogs sangs ji ltar rgya// bka' stsal pa/ chos sku kha dog sna tshogs 'od 'bar bas// ngo ba nyid kyi sku las ni
284a4(ca): ngo bo nyid kyi skur shar ba// 'od bum lnga la rig pa'i ye shes zhugs// mthong ba'i gzugs yod rig min longs sku lnga// tshem bu sems dpar bcas pa rim 'jug skad cig
284a5(ca): 'charatango bo nyid rang dang 'dra ba rdo rje sems dpar shar// ye shes snang ba me long lta bur rtogs// des skye med chos sku'i srog kyang bzung // rin 'byung snang la so sor rtogs
284a6(ca): pab sha ra ye shes so sor gsal bas dpe byad brgyad cu dang // mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis stobs ni bco brgyad ldan// stobs lnga ni byang chub yan lag rdzogs//
284a7(ca): mtha' yas rang las shar bas mnyam nyid ye shes gsal// der sangs rgyas gzigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// rnam dag thugs shar zhing khams sku gsum
284b1(ca): bcas pa mthong // 'gro drug smang ba rdul dang rdul phran gzigs// rgya mtsho thigs par bgrang dang skye gnas sdug bsngal mthong // 'gro drug rnams kyi las dang bsam pa kun kyang
284b2(ca): mthong / ngo bo nyid las don yod grub pa shar bas ni// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rang la shar// skad cig 'khor 'das gar 'gro 'phrin las grub// ngo bo nyid las rnam par snang
284b3(ca): mdzad shar// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rang la rdzogs// des sku lnga ye shes lnga rdzogs rang la rang nyid snang // des sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba rang shar gnas// man
284b4(ca): shel lta bur sku gsum phyi nang med// rang la snang bar mdzad pas rnam snang chen pos bya'o// rig pa'i lha mo'i sgo la 'jug pa'i tshe// ye shes rig pa ma pang bu rgyug 'dra//
284b5(ca): ye shes rang snang 'dam gyi pad+ma 'dra// rang sa zin pa nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// der mkhyen pa thob pa'i drug pa rdo rje 'chang // thugs rje 'byung ba yi ge drug gi 'gro don mdzad//
284b6(ca): thub drug 'gro don zad nas sems dpa' las zad nas// thugs rje mtha' zad ye shes glong du grol// zhes seng ge sgra'i dgongs pa las/ rnal 'byor mngon
284b7(ca): sangs rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste gya gnyis pa'o// kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ sa mdang ba dam tshig dang // dbye ba
285a1(ca): / bye brag ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ bar do ngo bo ma 'dres sku gsum la// nges tshig sems can lnga lus bor//
285a2(ca): phyi ma sems de ma blangs pas// bar na sku gsum rang shar na// rgyu rkyen med pa snga phyir bar na sangs rgyas de bos bya// dbye ba mang yang chos nyid bar do
285a3(ca): srid pa bar do'o// mtshan nyid 'byung ldan la zha rnam shes dbyings su tham// bag chags bag la nyal// gzung 'dzin gyi rkun skar thon// byung tshor rgyun chad dge sdig
285a4(ca): cha mnyam// de dus chos nyid bar do rang bzhin ni// rang byung dkyil 'khor nam mkha' shar zhes bya// rnal 'byor rang ngo shes pa grol ba'i sa// yun dus ji tsam gnas
285a5(ca): ngan ni/ sems can tshe thal dus su yang // zhag lnga bar du bde dang ldan// de yi dus na tshor ba bde sdug bral// khyung phrug dang ni seng phrug ltar// rnal 'byor lus rgya
285a6(ca): grol zhes bya// tshe bral skye gnas mod mi len// len na sems can nyid rgyud pas// bka' lung 'gro la phan mi thogs par 'gyur// rnam shes gzhir thim snga phyi lus
285a7(ca): ma blangs// lus med phyir na sems skye srog rtsa med// lus med phyir na sems rten tsat+ta med// de yi phyir na sems sam sgo gsum med// de phyir sems rnga dbugs kyang
285b1(ca): med/ de phyir sems kyis 'gro drug gnas mi len zhes bya// des na chos nyid par do ye shes dbyings kyi gzhi// skyon gyis ma gos spyi yi yon tan ni// sku gsum rtogs
285b2(ca): pa ma shar mkhyen pa'i sar mi gnas// bag chags mtshams ma sbyar bas par do la mi gnas// sa lam rang sa snga bas sa dang lam mi gnas// skye ba ma blangs 'gro drug
285b3(ca): la mi gnas// mi gnas gzhi yis sku gsum rang ngor gsal// snga phyi lus med sgrib la ma sbyangs dag/ rnam shes gzhir thim nyon mongs ma spangs dag/ skye gnas
285b4(ca): ma blangs 'khor ba ma spangs dag/ rang byung dkyil 'khor rang shar snang srid dag/ dag pa gzhi yis sku gsum dri med bstan// snga phyi lus kyi sgrib shing med// sku gsum
285b5(ca): chos nyid sgrib pa'i dbang ma song // rigs drug lus sems med pas nyon mongs dbang ma song // dge sdig sems ma bskyed pas bag chags dbang ma song // 'gro drug
285b6(ca): lus ma blangs pas las kyi dbang ma song // dbang du ma song gzhi yis sku gsum spyis bstan// 'gro drug ma blangs skye gnas bar ma gcad// bag chags mtshams
285b7(ca): ma sbyar bas bar ngos par ma gcad// sa lam ma bgrod sa lam bar ma gcad// bar mo gcad pas sku gsum dkyil 'khor rang sar bstan// de ltar bar do spyi yi yon tan
286a1(ca): ni/ btsalnga yongs la khyab par bstan pa'o// zhes seng ge sgra nI m+b+ha la sbyor las/ bar dbyu 'i bye brag rnam par ba shad pa'i le'u kye gya gsum pa/
286a2(ca): / kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ sbyis par ngo yi grol gnas// gdams pa bar dor rang grol bstan// de yi gdams pa ji ltar
286a3(ca): lags/ rang bzhin gnas kyi bar do la// rgyud lung kun gyi don bkrol la// ngo spod gsum gyis gtan la dbab// rang rig rtogs pas thag bcad nas// dgongs pa rang shar
286a4(ca): gsal ba dang // chos nyid par dor ye shes ngos gzung la// longs sku rdo rje 'dzin par mngon sangs rgyas par bya// srid pa bar dor las kyi 'gro bzlog la// rdo rje sems dpar
286a5(ca): sems sog kyang gdab// blo dman skye ba phyi mar bag chags rjes grol bya// tshe bral mod du skye ba mi len pa// chos nyid bar do 'gro kun 'char nges der// skal ldan grol ba'i gdams
286a6(ca): pa bka' stsal pa// ye shes rang snang skyon med 'dam gyi pad+ma la// rig pa rang sa nyi ma'i snying po lta bur gzung // chos nyid gnas lugs snga phyi lus kyi sgrib pa med// sku gsum
286a7(ca): 'od gsal gzha' tshon lta bu gcer bur gnas// yin lugs gzung 'dzin gzhir thim rig par gcer bu'i thugs// 'char lugs las rlung lus sems 'brel med 'od zer gcer
286b1(ca): bur gnas// gcer bu rnam gsum ma shes na// bag chags sbubs ni nyi zla gzas zin 'dra// 'khor du 'khor sa med pa gzhan snang dag pa'i rang snang shar// gol du gol
286b2(ca): sa med pa rang nyid dkyil 'khor shar// 'khrul du 'khrul sa med pa gdams ngag rtogs pa'i shes rab shar// gegs sel rnam gsum ma shes na// lam 'bras sa la ma tsho la
286b3(ca): byed pa/ byang thang las pa'i 'gro na bu 'dra// sku gsum 'od gsal ye shar bas// kun tu 'od la gnas pa'i sa// mi thob rang dbang med pa'i gnad// ngo bo sku gsum
286b4(ca): ye sangs rgyas// skye shi rgyun chod nges pa'i gnad// ye shes sgo lnga zang thal bas// mthong ba'i yul la gdams ngag rang ngo mi rtog dbang med gnad// gdams ngag gnad
286b5(ca): gsum ma shes na// gyi nga ling sgrog tu bcug pa 'dra// 'bras bu rang sar ga la phyin// rang snang pho brang zer 'od gsal yang btab// sku gsum ngo bo'i snang bas gsal yang
286b6(ca): btab/ rig pa gdams ngag rkyen du shar bas gsal yang btab// gsal 'debs rnam gsum ma shes na// me long g.ya' yis bsgribs pa 'dra// 'od zer lam ston
286b7(ca): yid ches rdeb pa'i gzer// sku gsum ngon chod 'khor ba ru log gzer// rang shar dgongs pa 'gyur med rgyun du bcas// ye shes sgo lnga rang ngo rang la mi gsal thabs med/
287a1(ca): gzer/ tagazer bu rnam gsum ma shes na// ko sgyu med pa'i gru pa 'dra// rang snang chos dbyings pho brang ni// kun gzhi me long zang thal bas// phyi yi
287a2(ca): snang ba gzung yul med par mngon sangs rgyas// rang byung sgra gsum dkyil 'khor ni// 'od gsal chos dbyings me long ste// zang thal shar ba sa lus kyi sgrib shing med//
287a3(ca): 'khor ba'i rtod phur med par mngon sangs rgyas// thugs kyi rig pa chos nyid rang shar bas// thugs rig pa'i me long gzung 'dzin bag chags dag/ 'gyur byed zang
287a4(ca): thal rig par mngon sangs rgyas// me long rnam gsum ma shes na// mun pa sros pa'i skar ma dang 'dra// de ltar don nyid bco brgyad kyis// rtogs pa'i shes rab
287a5(ca): thams cad mkhyen par 'char// rang gsal dkyil 'khor de la rgyu rkyen med// rang grol rig pa de la bcos ma bslad// rang shar dgongs pa sems kyis ma gzung ste//
287a6(ca): sku gsum rang sa dngos las 'bras bu'i spogs mi tshol// lhun grub ye shes de las 'pho 'gyur gnas mi song // de yi ge nad dang gzer gsum bstan pa ni// phyi yi snang ba chos nyid//
287a7(ca): rang gdangs shar// 'khor bar lus sems 'tshogs sa med pa'i gzer// thugs kyi mkhyen pa ye shes gdangs su sha ra// gzung 'dzin sems su 'gyur mi srid pa'i gzer//
287b1(ca): gsung gi zer ga dang sa 'od zer zang thal bas// lus sems las kyi rlung gis sgral mi srid pa'i gzer// rang snang zang thal rtog sgrib med// rang rig rang gsal mkhyen par
287b2(ca): shar/ sgo lnga 'od gsal sgrib med rang sar grol// bgrod du med pa'i grol ba'i gzer zhes bya'o// mkhyen pa longs sku ye shes rdzogs par 'char ba'i gzer bstan pa/
287b3(ca): rang gsal sku yi khyab bdal sku nyid mkhyen par sha ra// ngo bo nyid chos kyi sku las ni// ngo bo nyid kyi sku shar ba// rang dang mnyam pazhi lha bzhi bcur shar// rang shar thugs kyi khyab
287b4(ca): bad la rig pa'i rang gdangs mkhyen par sha ra// thugs dang mnyam pa'i rig pa ye shes longs sku khyab par zhugs// rang grol gsung gi khyab bdal zer gdangs chos kyi sgo mor
287b5(ca): shar brjod med don dang mnyam pa'i sgra dang tshig/ zer 'od sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'char// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam dag mkhyen pa rnam dag phyogs med do// de ltar
287b6(ca): rnal 'byor grol ba'i sa tshad ni// chos nyid bar de srid pa'i la tshig yin// rnal 'byor rtog pa glong gyur dus mnyam bdun gyis grol// 'jug dang snang dang shes pa dang //
287b7(ca): thob grol mkhyen dang thugs rje mnyam// zhes seng ge sgra sgrogs theg dman zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyud las/ bar dor mngon sangs rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gdab pa'i le'u ste bya
288a1(ca): bzhi pa'o// // kye ta bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ grol ba'i sku gsum mkhyen pa de/ skyon bral dag pa ji ltar
288a2(ca): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ye shes sgrib med ma rig rang grol ba// 'od gsal zang thal shar bas rtsal gyi sgrib pa med// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa las grol//
288a3(ca): mthong ba'i yul la rtogs pa'i shes rab shar// des bag chags bsgribs pa med// bag chags rgyun med rmongs pa'i ma rig pa las grol// sku gsum dkyil 'khor rang
288a4(ca): shar bas// kun tu rtag pa ma rig pa las grol// ye shes sgo lnga zang thal shar ba yis// nyon mongs sgrib med ma rig pa las grol// sku gsum rang ngo shes pas 'kho/
288a5(ca): ba yi/ gting thag las dang las kyi sgri ba med ces bya// sgrib pa med pa mkhyen pa rang sar bstan// de ni 'khor ba'i 'khrul pa zhig pa yin// rang snang sku gsum ye shes
288a6(ca): rtogs pas gzhan snang 'khrul pa zhig/ sku gsum skye 'jig med pas lus kyi 'khrul pa zhig/ gsung gi nyi 'od zer 'phro bas ngag gi 'khrul pa zhig/ thugs la mkhyen pa
288a7(ca): rig pas gzung 'dzin yid sems 'khrul pa zhig/ rlung gis sems sgral ba med pas 'byung ba'i 'khrul pa zhig/ srid par sbyor ba med pas skye gnas 'khrul pa zhig
288b1(ca): ye shes nyi ma shar bas gsal 'grib nyi nub 'khrul pa zhig/ zhag dang lo zla 'das pas dus kyi 'khrul pa zhig/ chos nyid pho brang thig ler 'khyil bas phyogs kyi 'khrul pa
288b2(ca): zhig ces seng ge sgra'i rgyud las/ grol ba mngon gyur sangs rgyas sgrib pa dag ste ma rig pa grol nas 'khrul pa zhig mkhyen pa thob pa'i le'u ste gya lnga pa'o// /
288b3(ca): / kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ gang zag skal ba zhan dang blo dman dang // theg dman blo yi bcos dang rtsol bzhan// chos nyid par dor rtogs
288b4(ca): par ma gyur na// thabs kyi lam gyis ji ltar grol bar bgyi// bka' stsal pa/ kye rdo rje 'dzin pas nges par zung zhig/ shes rab rtogs pa'i blo can gyis// mchog
288b5(ca): gi 'od gsal chen po la// rig pa zang thal shar ba gces// de yis tshe 'dir bar do med par grol// skyes bu las dang skal ldan ni// mchog gi 'od gsal chung ngu de//
288b6(ca): chos nyid ma yi bar do la// mkhyen pa'i shes rab shar ba gces// srid pa'i bar do med par grol// blo dman par dor rim 'jug la// rig pa'i rang sa zin pa gcas
288b7(ca): des kyang sa lam med par grol// rigs drug 'khrul pa'i 'od drug la// rig pa 'gro ldog shes pa gces// de yis srid pa bar do ye shes sogs kyang thebs// de yis
289a1(ca): gdams ngag gsal 'debs dus// rig pa mngon du shar ba gces// de yis yi dam rdo rje sems dpa'i srog kyang zin// chos nyid bar do 'da' ba ni//
289a2(ca): ngo bo chos sku thugs kyi zer// yum gyi rang bzhin bum pa lnga la yid kyi 'gyu ba zhugs// dang po som nyi mtshams sbyor te// ci yin mnyam pa'i yid tsam 'gyus// de nas
289a3(ca): bag chags rtog sgrib spogs 'debs te// dus kyi skyigs ma kha drag lam dang 'dra// srid pa'i skye gnas dug gi me tog 'dra// 'khor bar 'jug pa zo'i chu khyud mo 'dra//
289a4(ca): som nyi rang 'od zer las bar do 'od lus blangs// ci yin snyam pas yin min shes pa zhugs// chos nyid par do nyi ma shar ba lta bu la// rtog pa phra ba gsang rtog bdun
289a5(ca): skyes pas// chos nyid ye shes snang ba dag pa la// nam mkha'i sprin lta bu yi hribs la byung // de las ngan rtog sum cu rtsa gsum bye rags snang // de nyid chos nyid par
289a6(ca): do nyi ma rtog pas na ma sros lta bur nub// de nas phyi rtog bzhi bcu spogs// mun pa sros pas skar ma shar ba ltar// 'gro drug grong khyer gsal ba rum tser byung //
289a7(ca): de la 'od gsal chung ngu gdams pa ye shes sogs gdab pa// 'di ni skal ba zhan dang blo dman le lo can// chos nyid par dor rang grol ma thob na// gsang la ma bsags
289b1(ca): la ma thabs kyis grol ba'i lam zhes bya// 'di la skyel ba su yin par shes pa gnad yin te// bla ma lung ldan gdams ngag skye la ma dang // rang gis nyams su longs te
289b2(ca): rtogs pa'i skyel ma dang // 'chi khar gsal 'debs grags kyi skyel ma gces// zer gyi ba su na mas 'od zer la ma bstan nas// 'od lnga pa sun mas zhing khams
289b3(ca): dag par skyed pa// sgra yi bsu na ma ska gsu ma dkyil 'a khor bro ba// chos nyid 'das pa yin par shes na sa ni// srid pa bar do ston gzugs srid pa'i sha gzugs can//
289b4(ca): dbang po kun tshang 'od kyi lus de la// yi chad drug 'byung shi ba dran nas skye gnas tshol// las kyi dge sdig gshin rje'i snang ba ston// de dus gdams pa yin par shes par
289b5(ca): bya srid pa'i bar do de ni rang bzhin las// chos nyid par dor rtogs pas ma grol na// nges par bar de 'od lus len dang gcig/ sngar gyi bag chags rtog pa dran dang gnyis
289b6(ca): sngar dran phyis skye de rang shes pa'i shes rab gsum// yid lus 'od kyi sgo lngas 'gro drug mthong nges bzhi// sgyu ma ye shes lus yin dran gsal blo rno lnga'o// de yang sems de sku
289b7(ca): gsum brgyud nas brgyud mar gnas pa na// ci ste da ltar bag chags sbubs nas sbrul sku ste// skad cig mo grol ye shes lam la sbyangs// rin chen zang thal sbubs na chos
290a1(ca): skur gnas// skad cig dang po dang la dus mnyam rtog pas grol// longs sku sgyu ma 'od kyi sbubs la skad cig gsum gyis grol// sgyu ma 'od lus
290a2(ca): srid pa'i sha gzugs la// rtog pa rkun bu bag la nyal ba de// dran pa'i som nyi kun nas ldang ba'o// kun nas ldang ba'i yid sems de// snga phyi da lta'i rtog pa shes rab
290a3(ca): skyes pa'i dus// shin tu blo rno dran pa gsal bas na// de la grol ba'i gdams pa gsang lam bsogs lam btsal// gdams ngag nyams su blangs pa sngar shugs
290a4(ca): kyis/ ta rang dbang dran pa mngon du 'gyur ba yin// de tshe rtogs pa khyad par skye dus yin// sngar gyi nyams len gdams ngag rnams// de tshe mi dran mi srid do// der sngar
290a5(ca): byas mi dran mi 'byung na// dge sdig las kyi 'bras bu mi 'byung dgos// las mi 'byung bar gyur pas na// las kyis 'gro drug mi 'khor 'gyur// des na bka' yi gdams pa
290a6(ca): dran par nges// khyad par rtogs pa nyams len dang ni rgyal ba'i ngag/ dge sdig las ni shin tu gsal ba'i dus// bar do 'od lus yin pas thams cad rang gsal lo//
290a7(ca): gdams pas ji ltar lam btsal na// 'gro drug grong khyer dran pa dang // skye ba len sgo dgag pa dang // bar do yin pa dran gsal gdab// de rang sgyu lus yin pa dran pa
290b1(ca): dang tata gnyis med spyod pas sgyu lus bsgyur btu ba dran// des rdo rje sems dpa' yi dam lhar bsgyur ba dran pa'o// 'od lus sgyu mar shes pas gnyis su med// gar
290b2(ca): yang bsgyur du btub par shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpar lus 'phos pas// lam pa'i rdo rje sems dpas bar do rang srog gzung // skye ba mi len bsam la skye ba 'phos pas
290b3(ca): khegs dar rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'od gas la sku// de rang shar dgongs pa zung zhugs pa sa// rdo rje rigs 'dzin sa la de nyid pa segs la ma thob// sgo lnga ye shes zang thal
290b4(ca): 'od gsal las// gsang la ma zung du bcug pas rdo rje lta bur thob// de la gsang lam dag pa'i gzer gsum ni// ye shes rgyu lus rdo rje sems dpa' de// rang rig gzhan
290b5(ca): rig rig pa'i thugs gsal bas// 'od gsal sgrib med ye shes spogs kyang thebs// sku gsum 'od gas la rang sang dkyil 'khor spogs kyang thebs// bla ma'i gdams pa rang
290b6(ca): sharan rmongs pa sprogs byung thebs// de gang zhis rtogs so zhes pa na// byang chub sems lo ma rigs 'dzin sa yin pas// chos nyid can ni cha gang tshad du shar// mngon
290b7(ca): bapar shes dang mi rtog ting 'dzin yod// mngon par shes pas gdams ngag snga phyi shes// ting 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' lam gyi srog kyang 'dzin// dgongs pas srid ni
291a1(ca): ji ltar 'dzin zhe na// mtshan bcas 'od lus lhar bsgyur nas// mtshan med rig pa'i 'od gsal rang grol chos// stong gsal rang shar 'gyur med dang
291a2(ca): la srog kyang gzung // 'gro drug grong khyer 'khor ba zang thal shes// des ye shes lus la skye ba gzhan mi len// bar do rten 'brel sgyu lus 'od gsal bas// 'dod pas len pa'i/
291a3(ca): skye gnas gzhan mi tshol// sku gsum lhan grub rang la rtogs pasas lam rang grol chod// des mchog gis 'od gsal spogs thebs mngon sangs rgyas// zhes seng ge sgra nyi zla kha sgor
291a4(ca): las 'od gsal chung ngu ye shes sman du byung ba'i le'u ste gya drug pa'o// // kye bcom ldan thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ chos nyid par do ye shes
291a5(ca): lam la ma grol na// blo dman bag chags sod de skye ba brgyud nas grol lugs ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba de yi skye gnas len lugs ni// zhag lnga skad cig lnga
291a6(ca): la chos nyid bar do la 'das na// skad cig drug la som nyi za bar byed// skad cig bdun na par de 'od lus len// de nas yi chad shi ba rjes su dran// chos nyid par do ye shes nyi ma'i
